name: Active Directory Monitoring and Alerting - Beats
summary: Monitor AD changes and user authentication
description: Monitors changes to AD structure, groups and users.  Separates information from warning and critical messages.  Alerts on changes to AD structure and password resets.  Framework for alerting on other logged events such as Exchange certificate expiry.

parameters.name: AuthEvent_minus_DC
parameters.title: Authentication events minus DCS
parameters.default_value: (winlogbeat_event_id:4625 OR winlogbeat_event_id:4771 OR winlogbeat_event_id:4820) AND NOT cmg_requestingName:<DC-NAME> AND NOT cmg_requestingName:<DC-NAME>

parameters.name: P2_email_sender
parameters.title: P2 Graylog Sender
parameters.description: email sender for Priority two alerts

parameters.name: P1_email_sender
parameters.title: P1 Graylog Sender
parameters.description: email address - sender -  priority one events

parameters.name: P2_email_Receiver
parameters.title: P2 Graylog Receiver
parameters.description: Distribution group to receive priority TWO alert

title.@value: Priority 1 Event - High Notification - E-mail and SMS

description.@value: All Priority One Alerts for e-mail and SMS

template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["${user.BeatsInput}"]
path:
  data: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\cache\winlogbeat\data
  logs: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\logs
tags:
 - windows
winlogbeat:
  event_logs:
   - name: Application
   - name: System
   - name: Security

description.@value: DNS table PTR to internal hosts

default_template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: 
   - ${user.BeatsInput}
path:
  data: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\cache\winlogbeat\data
  logs: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\logs
tags:
 - windows
winlogbeat:
  event_logs:
   - name: Application
   - name: System
   - name: Security

description.@value: Marks Alerts coming into P1 and P2 alerts as such to fire off conditions.

source.@value:
pipeline "P1-P2: ALERT MARKER"
stage 0 match all
rule "AP1-2_Create_Alert_Marker"
end

description.@value:
Admin Changed user Password [4724]
| Alert Priority 2
Security Alerts to notify on User, Machine, Group, OU

source.@value:
pipeline "winSECAlert Pipeline"
stage 0 match either
rule "WinSECAlert StageOne"
rule "WinSECAlert Stage0DropSet"
stage 1 match either
rule "AP3-WinSec-BadPw"
rule "AP3-WinSec-UserPWChange"
rule "AP2-WinSec-UserEnableDisable"
rule "AP2-WinSec-AdminPWChange"
rule "AP2-WinSec-UserDeleted"
rule "AP2-WinSec-UserNameChange"
rule "AP2-WinSec-UserLockChange"
rule "AP2-WinSec-NewUser"
rule "AP3-WinSec-BadPw-Kerberos"
rule "WinSECAlert StageTwo"
stage 2 match either
rule "AP2-WinSec-GroupDeleted"
rule "AP3-WinSec-GroupChanged"
rule "AP2-WinSec-NewGroupCreated"
rule "AP2-WinSec-NewGroupMember"
rule "AP2-WinSec-GroupMemberDelete"
rule "WinSECAlert StageThree"
stage 3 match either
rule "AP2-WinSec-NewOU"
rule "AP2-WinSec-OU-Deleted"
rule "AP2-WinSec-OU-Changed"
rule "AP2-WinSec-OU-Moved"
end

description.@value: Catch all warning and Error Level logs from Windows

Exchange STARTTLS certificate to EXPIRE [12018]
| Alert Priority 3

User Account Name Change [4781]
| Alert Priority 2

template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["${user.BeatsInput}"]
path:
  data: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\cache\winlogbeat\data
  logs: C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\logs
tags:
 - windows
 - DC
winlogbeat:
  event_logs:
   - name: Application
   - name: System
   - name: Security
   - name: DFS Replication
   - name: Directory Service
   - name: DNS Server
   - name: File Replication Service

description.@value:
Group Member Deleted - AD or Local [4733, 4729, 4757, 4747, 4752, 4762]
| Alert Priority 2

Group Membership Add - AD or Local [4732, 4728, 4756, 4746, 4751, 4761]
| Alert Priority 2
Focus on pulling out Errors and Alerting on them.

source.@value:
pipeline "WinERRPipeline"
stage 0 match either
rule "AP2-WinERR-ExchangeCertExpire"
stage 1 match either
rule "AP2-WinERR-ExchangeCertExpire-24hrs"
end

description.@value:
Exchange STARTTLS certificate to EXPIRE less than 24 hours [12018]
| Alert Priority 1

P1P2 Marker for Alert Conditions
| Alert Priority 1 & 2

source.@value:
rule "AP1-2_Create_Alert_Marker"
when
    NOT has_field("Alert")
then
    set_field("ALERT","TRUE");
end

description.@value: Allow Group Management and OU management alerts to pass to the next stage.

source.@value:
rule "WinSECAlert StageTwo"
when

  $message.winlogbeat_task		== "Security Group Management"      ||
  $message.winlogbeat_task      == "Directory Service Changes"
then

  //Allow this to pass through to next stage
  
end

description.@value:
User Locked Out or Account was Unlocked [4740, 4767]
| Alert Priority 2

Group Changed - AD or Local [4735, 4737, 4755, 4745, 4750, 4760]
| Alert Priority 2

title.@value: P2 - e-mail Exchange Cert has 5 Days
Exchange Cert Expire less than FIVE days

description.@value: Messages to be reported on - presented in a dashboard

Group Deleted - AD or Local [4734, 4730, 4758, 4748, 4753, 4763]
| Alert Priority 2
Allow Directory Services things like OU management alerts to pass to the next stage.

source.@value:
rule "WinSECAlert StageThree"
when
  $message.winlogbeat_task      == "Directory Service Changes"
then
  //Allow this to pass through
end

description.@value: AD Events in the last 2 hours
Pass through anything that is Windows Security Information events for ALL stages

source.@value:
rule "WinSECAlert StageOne"
when
  // Narrows and provideds clarity for what is coming through here
  $message.beats_type             == "winlogbeat"                       AND
  $message.winlogbeat_log_name    == "Security"                         AND
  $message.winlogbeat_level       == "Information"                      AND
  has_field("winlogbeat_event_id")                                      AND
    (
     $message.winlogbeat_task     == "Logon"                            OR
     $message.winlogbeat_task     == "Kerberos Authentication Service"  OR
     $message.winlogbeat_task     == "User Account Management"          OR
     $message.winlogbeat_task     == "Directory Service Changes"        OR
     $message.winlogbeat_task     == "Security Group Management"
     )
then
  //Allow this to pass through
  
end

description.@value: All Priority Two alerts - Only to e-mail

Group Created - AD or Local [4731, 4727, 4754, 4744, 4749, 4759]
| Alert Priority 2

WinSECAlert Stage Zero Drop Set -    Messages with the following will be dropped (not alerted, not recorded) 
**** Be careful with this - If you don't want alerting, it is better to 
* Shunt the message to P3-Reporting
* add a line to ignore it in "AP1-2_Create_Alert_Marker"
* Let it die a short death in WinShortLifeStream
